query: Tap the 'Install' button to bring up the options menu and look for the 'Uninstall' option.

result.chunks:
----
click on the uninstall button to mark or remove [app name] from the device.
result.content: click on the uninstall button to mark or remove [app name] from the device.

attribute.location_description:
Relative Location: The "Uninstall" button is located within a context menu that appears when the user selects an option to uninstall the app.
Absolute Location: It is situated near the bottom-right part of the screen, slightly above and to the right of the "Cancel" button.
attribute.shape_description: The "Uninstall" button is a rectangular button with rounded corners, located in the center of a pop-up window.
